column2: Appendix}}, ''heru''</ref>  Words with similar meaning are ''[[aran]]'' "king" and ''[[tar]]'' "high, lord".

column1: Latin ''herus'' means "lord, owner"; German ''herr'' is a modern word meaning "sir, lord, master".
* ''[[The Languages of Tolkien's Middle-earth]]'' by [[Ruth S. Noel]]
